Meet and Greet

Meet and Assist

This special and exclusive service is tailored for a variety of personalities e.g. Corporate Executives, VIPs, CIPs, Young Passengers (YP), Elderly Passengers, First Time Travellers, Passengers with Reduced Mobility (PRMs), Family and Group Travel.

Meet & Assist

This entails:


  • Personal assistance to/from the gates.
  • Assistance from respective departure unit/drop off point
  • Assisting passengers from/ connecting private charter planes
  • Assistance with the airport formalities
  • Monitoring of flights.
